description: This file declares function prototypes for a WTC (Wireless Terminal Controller) RBUS handler interface, primarily involving get/set operations, event subscriptions, and table row management for RBUS properties.

methods.name: WTC_TableUlongGetHandler
methods.description: Handles getting a ULong RBUS property.

methods.name: WTC_TableUlongSetHandler
methods.description: Handles setting a ULong RBUS property.

methods.name: WTC_TableUlongEventSubHandler
methods.description: Handles subscribing or unsubscribing to ULong RBUS property events.

methods.name: WTC_TableStringGetHandler
methods.description: Handles getting a String RBUS property.

methods.name: WTC_TableStringSetHandler
methods.description: Handles setting a String RBUS property.

methods.name: WTC_TableStringEventSubHandler
methods.description: Handles subscribing or unsubscribing to String RBUS property events.

methods.name: WTC_TableAddRowHandler
methods.description: Adds a row to an RBUS table.

methods.name: WTC_TableRemoveRowHandler
methods.description: Removes a row from an RBUS table.
